title: Rikki -the Baby Monkey
brief_description: Produced to show young children how monkeys live in their native habitat. The story of baby Rhesus monkey, showing how the mother cares for the baby animal, foodstuffs preferred by monkeys, who the animals spend their rime climbing in the jungle.
